quote: Life itself is a quotation.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Life is life. You choose to live it or you do not.
author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves

quote: Life is about cherishing memories, getting lost in moments of beauty, and enjoying profound joy and happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: After all, what's a life, anyway? We're born, we live a little while, we die.
author: E.B. White,  Charlotte's Web

quote: Life, for the living, is a gift of opportunity; an exercise of the will to choose.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

quote: Life is a series of punches. It presents a lot of challenges. It presents a lot of hardship, but the people that are able to take those punches and able to move forward are the ones that really do have a lot of success and have a lot of joy in their life and have a lot of stories to tell, too.
author: Josh Turner

quote: Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Kiss of the Night

quote: The quality of life is more important than life itself.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Life is problems. Living is solving problems.
author: Raymond E. Feist,  Silverthorn

quote: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Life is a gift, but living is a choice.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
author: Corita Kent

quote: Life is a culmination of the past, an awareness of the present, an indication of a future beyond knowledge, the quality that gives a touch of divinity to matter.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: The tragedy of life is what dies inside a man while he lives.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life—the way it really is—is a battle not between good and bad, but between bad and worse
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: Life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though sometimes it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character, and we must learn that the setbacks and grieves which we endure help us in our marching onward.
author: Henry Ford

quote: That I shall love always, I argue theethat love is life,and life hath immortality
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Life isn't worth living, unless it is lived for someone else.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is but a dream for the dead.
author: Gerard Way

quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Life is a succesion of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: Life is a book waiting to happen.
author: Sloan McBride

quote: life is a continous journey of transformation
author: Sukant Ratnakar,  Open the Windows

quote: Life is an essay you yourself have to write, start to finish.
author: Mo

quote: Don’t simply exist in this world, but grasp life’s potential by the jacket. Dare it to be all it can. Make life historical—a gripping account of accomplishment. Make life a mystery—a challenging, bold adventure. Make life heartfelt—an enduring, poetic romance. Whatever it is you make of your world, live the fairytale.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Eena, The Return of a Queen

quote: But what is life if you don't live it?
author: James Patterson,  Suzanne's Diary for Nicholas

quote: *"Maybe the whole point of my life is to make you feel more alive.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: 'Life, Love & Hope' is... I'm thinking 'larger picture.' I'm not trying to preach to anyone. We all get lost and caught up in our everyday problems. Your cellphone doesn't work or you got a parking ticket, you had a bad day at work. You can lose sight of the really important things in life; that's what the song is about.
author: Tom Scholz

quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: The meaning of life is that it is to be lived, and it is not to be traded and conceptualized and squeezed into a patter of systems.
author: Bruce Lee,  Striking Thoughts: Bruce Lee's Wisdom for Daily Living

quote: Love is for life; life is for love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is an adventure of passion, risk, danger, laughter, beauty, love; a burning curiosity to go with the action to see what it is all about, to go search for a pattern of meaning, to burn one's bridges because you're never going to go back anyway, and to live to the end.
author: Saul D. Alinsky,  Reveille for Radicals

quote: One must try to make one's life as pleasant as possible. I'm alive and it's not my fault, which means I must somehow go on living the best I can, without bothering anybody, until I die.''But what makes you live? With such thoughts, you'll sit without moving, without undertaking anything...''Life won't leave one alone as it is.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace

quote: Life is what you think about it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is a train of moods like a string of beads; and as we pass through them they prove to be many colored lenses, which paint the world their own hue, and each shows us only what lies in its own focus.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
author: Voltaire

quote: I have come to see clearly that life is more than self. It is more than doing what I want, striving for what will benefit me, dreaming of all I can be. Life is all about my relationship with God. There is no higher calling, no loftier dream, and no greater goal than to live, breathe, and be poured out for Jesus Christ."--Jamie in Brother Andrew's "The Calling
author: Brother Andrew,  The Narrow Road: Stories of Those Who Walk This Road Together

quote: A life is not a waste of time
author: Nalini Singh,  Angels' Blood

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life ... is a taleTold by an idiot, full of sound and fury,Signifying nothing.
author: William Shakespeare,  Macbeth

quote: The meaning of life is that it stops.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Bryne

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson
